mapper.select: select * from tbl_support where rownum < 11 order by supportno desc

select supportno, partcode, requirement, materialprocess, dayschedule, deliverydate, partname from (select rownum rn, supportno, partcode, requirement, materialprocess, dayschedule, deliverydate, partname from (select A.supportno, A.partcode, A.requirement, A.materialprocess, A.dayschedule, A.deliverydate, B.partname from tbl_support A, tbl_part B
where A.partcode=B.partcode
order by A.supportno desc) where rownum <= (#{pageNum} * #{amount})) where rn > ((#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount})
mapper.insert:
select seq_supportno.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_support(SupportNo, partcode, requirement, materialprocess, dayschedule, deliverydate) values(#{supportNo}, #{partCode}, #{requirement}, #{materialProcess}, #{daySchedule}, #{deliveryDate})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_support A, tbl_part B where A.partcode=B.partcode

select A.supportno, A.partcode, A.materialprocess, A.dayschedule, A.requirement, A.deliverydate, B.partname from tbl_support A, tbl_part B where A.partcode=B.partcode and supportno=#{supportNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update tbl_support set partcode=#{partCode}, materialprocess=#{materialProcess}, dayschedule=#{daySchedule}, requirement=#{requirement}, deliverydate=#{deliveryDate} where supportno=#{supportNo}
